attributes.action: Petiton to give Southend-On-Sea A New Skatepark
attributes.additional_details:
Hi!

Thanks for checking this out. The aim of this petition is to get Southend-On-Sea A New skatepark closer to the town centre!

The urban sports within southend over the years has contunied to grow. After numerous attempts to ask the Council for a new skatepark we have had little or no reply.

Within the local area of Southend there are a number of skateparks but Sadly they are poorly maintained or are too dangerous to go.

I feel that a new skatepark would not only attact more people of our sport to the town but it would also give the Skaters, Scooters, And Bmxers a place to go.

rejection.details: This is still a matter for the Council to decide upon, not anything the Government can influence them into doing.  Maybe contact your local MP would help a campaign?
